name: Pitiful Little Band
Lore: 'The Emperor''s defense of the forest moon of Endor appeared to work with devastating effectiveness.',
Text: 'If your scout is battling opponent''s scout, spy or operative, add one battle destiny. OR If you have a spy or scout at Bunker or any prison, place out of play one captured spy of ability < 3 or captured operative there. Retrieve Force equal to double that captive''s forfeit.',
